verses.roman:
madhye madhye āmi tomāra nikaṭa yāiba
alakṣite rahi' tomāra nṛtya dekhiba'

synonyms: madhye madhye—at intervals; āmi—I; tomāra nikaṭa—near You; yāiba—shall go; alakṣite rahi'-keeping invisible; tomāra nṛtya—Your dancing; dekhiba—I shall see.
translation: "I shall also go to see You at intervals. Keeping Myself invisible, I shall watch You dance."
